bibl.title: Notes on Menander's Phasma.
bibl.note: By-product of work devoted to Menander's Phasma during the preparation of a third volume for the new Loeb edition of Menander. - I. The Mytilene mosaic. - II. The St Petersburg parchment. - III. The opening act. - IV. Part-division in the Oxyrhynchus fragments [P. Oxy. XXXVIII, 2825]. - V. The Oxyrhynchus fragments and the plot of Phasma. - VI. Details of text: Vv. 1, 3-7, 7, 8, 10, 28-29, 34-38, 39-41, 45-47, 48-49, 51, 73-74, 80-82, 85-88, 88-89, 97-98. - VII. Donatus on Ter. Eunuchus 9 (I.272 Wessner). - VIII. Dating Phasma.
ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, Notes on Menander's Phasma.
ZPE 123 (1998) pp. 35-48, 1 fac-sim. et pl. I.
